text: Keeping Up with the Kardashians matriarch Kris Jenner donned a garish pair of glossy green leather pants in Manhattan's Tribeca neighborhood on Wednesday. Unfortunately, the 62 - year - old momager's unflattering slacks looked more like a garbage bag than high fashion. The Calabasas socialite paired her plastic - looking pleated pants with a sporty black turtleneck, a matching tuxedo blazer, and patent leather spike - heeled pumps.
